meaningMnemonic: If you figure out how to use a <radical>tsunami</radical> as a <radical>weapon</radical>, everyone is going to <kanji>die</kanji>. You can't control a tsunami, you fool. Now you've doomed us all.
readingMnemonic: The only way to maybe not <kanji>die</kanji> is to find <reading>boats</reading> (ぼつ). As long as the boats don't get smashed by the tsunami, you might be able to cheat death by holding onto the boats and not drowning.
